title: Find the Missing Shipment
content:
acking survivors from an earlier attack. In this location, you'll encounter various adversaries like Gnoll Hunter, Gnoll Flind, Gnoll Fang of Yeenoghu, Gnoll Flesh gnawer, and Hyenas. Once you successfully defeat these enemies, your journal will be updated with advancements in the "Find the Missing Shipment" quest. Next, engage in a conversation with one of the survivors named Rugan. Rugan will ask whether any others from his crew have managed to survive, and you can respond with:
